name: inadequate

C1 not good enough or too low in quality: woefully inadequate This work is woefully (= extremely) inadequate - you'll have to do it again.
C1 too small in amount: She rejected the $2 million offer as totally inadequate.
not confident enough to deal with a situation: Maddie's a real expert on art, so I feel completely inadequate whenever I talk to her about it.
